address: Xã Nậm Hàng, Huyện Nậm Nhùn, Tỉnh Lai Châu
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Nậm Hàng, Huyện Nậm Nhùn, Tỉnh Lai Châu"**

Okay, so I need to figure out what happened to "Xã Nậm Hàng, Huyện Nậm Nhùn, Tỉnh Lai Châu".  My first instinct is to check for any province-level changes.  Looking at those directives (60-NQ/TW), Lai Châu seems to be staying put. That's a good starting point, but it means the change is likely at a lower level.

Now, I'll need to dig into the relevant resolutions. I can skip anything about Điện Biên. Ah, here we go, `1670/NQ-UBTVQH15` from the Standing Committee of the National Assembly. This is for Lai Châu, so this looks promising. Line 26: jackpot! It says the old "Xã Nậm Hàng," along with "thị trấn Nậm Nhùn" and "xã Nậm Manh," are all being *merged* into a new administrative unit that's also named "**xã Nậm Hàng**". The old address contains "Xã Nậm Hàng" and "Huyện Nậm Nhùn", so this has to be it.

Just to be sure, I'll cross-reference that with the new ward data. I see a new ward listed with the name "Xã Nậm Hàng" in "Tỉnh Lai Châu," with code "03434". That's a perfect match!

Therefore, the old "Xã Nậm Hàng" is gone, but it has been merged into the new "Xã Nậm Hàng".  This has a high confidence level, considering how clear the resolution is.

citation.header: 1670/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lai Châu
citation.line: 26. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Nậm Nhùn, xãNậm Manh và xã Nậm Hàngthành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Nậm Hàng**.
